subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: San Antonio, the N.B.A.’s epitome of consistency, met the Nets, a struggling team that had just fired its coach and reassigned its general manager. Not surprisingly, the Spurs ran away with the game.
snippet: San Antonio, the N.B.A.’s epitome of consistency, met the Nets, a struggling team that had just fired its coach and reassigned its general manager. Not surprisingly, the Spurs ran away with the game.
